oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on January 27, 2004 with Aḥmad Muḥammad ‘Awaḍ, male, born in 1925 in al-Manshīyah, Palestine. He was a store keeper at the Department of Agriculture.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع أحمد محمد عوض في 27 كانون الثاني يانير عام 2004، ذكر، ولد عام 1925 في المنشية، فلسطين. عمل كأمين مخزن في دائرة الزراعة.
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Education and childhood in the village. (@ 0:00)
Political turmoil, revolutionaries and military activity. (@ 41:13)
Battles, armed resistance and expulsion to Lebanon. (@ 60:51)
